channel.title: Notice board | Unimi
channel.description: General notice board of the University of Milan "La Statale"

item.title: Call for admissions to Collegio di Milano - a. y. 2024-2025
University scholarships definitive ranking a.y. 2023/2024:
item.description: The definitive ranking has been published a.y. 2023/2024: University scholarships - Students enrolled in the first year of a master's degree programme. The outcome is available in your helpdesk, under "Right to study, grants, accommodation and catering" > if you want to access the details of the rankings published in the last two academic year.%0A

item.title: Call for the English language development course in view of the B2 First (FCE) exam
item.description: Registration is open for the English language development course with a view to sitting the Cambridge B2 First (FCE) exam. Classes, for the whole duration of 20 hours, are taking place in person in May-June at the SLAM Centre according to the calendar reported in the call.%0A%0AüìÑ Read the call for further details

item.title: Call for the B1 Preliminary (PET) exam on 29 + 30 May 2024 - 1 AVAILABLE SEAT
item.description: The call is open to register for the digital Cambridge English B1 Preliminary (PET) exam scheduled on 29 + 30 May 2024.%0A%0AüìÑ Read the call for further details

item.title: Call for the C1 Advanced (CAE) exam on 14+15 May 2024 - SOLD OUT

item.title: Study awards (type A-B-C) in memory of Professor Clementina Gatti. a.y. 2023/2024
item.description: For the academic year 2023/2024, the University is giving out three study awards (type A-B-C) in memory of Professor Clementina Gatti.%0AFor further information, check out the calls for applications on the dedicated pages.%0A%0A‚ñ∂Ô∏è Learn more on Unimi.it
